TopicTitle: How do I make my own engine FX? [All Help Appreciated!]

Articles.Content:
I've seen the whole HotRockets thing, and I'm sure custom FX are supported by game code, SQUAD made their own, anyways.

I've been trying to make my parts more realistic, and the fact that I can't make my own FX irritates me. :c

So, does anyone have any tutorial or by any means have ANY WAY TO ANY HELP ANY ME!?!?!?!!??!?

Needless to say, any help is appreciated.

I have knowledge of Blender smoke stuff.

I already made my own part, for my mod/addon Naten Innovations.

So, yeah. How to make engine smoke as demonstration man...?

Naten
